name: REQUISITION VR
summary: Immerse yourself in a heart-pumping, extraction-based PvPvE adventure set in a vast, post-apocalyptic world. Scavenge for resources and unleash your creativity with a revolutionary crafting system that lets you combine any objects using tape, creating one-of-a-kind, game-changing weapons. Team up with friends to explore expansive locations, overcome treacherous terrain, and take down both AI and human opponents in intense battles. Extract valuable loot to upgrade your base, enhance your arsenal, and...
